template.name: Принтеры Kyocera
template.description: ECOSYS M2540dn, ECOSYS M3540idn, ECOSYS M4132idn, ECOSYS M6230cidn

trigger.expression: {Kyocera Printers:Black-Int.last()}<=10 or {Kyocera Printers:Magenta-Int.last()}<=10 or {Kyocera Printers:Yellow-Int.last()}<=10 or {Kyocera Printers:Cyan-Int.last()}<=10
trigger.name: 10% Осталось!

trigger.expression: {Kyocera Printers:Black-Int.last()}<=20 or {Kyocera Printers:Magenta-Int.last()}<=20 or {Kyocera Printers:Yellow-Int.last()}<=20 or {Kyocera Printers:Cyan-Int.last()}<=20
trigger.name: 20% Мало тонера в Арендом отделе
